虽然steam时间只有9小时，但是这个游戏我早已通关了一遍又一遍。
  光圈科技在我心中已不只是一个公司，GLaDOS也不止是一个刀子嘴豆腐心的Caroline。
  我相信V社，相信G胖，但不希望他数三。
  美好的故事不需要结局。

This game was such a giant upgrade to the original. My favourite parts of the first game were when you were outside the test chambers and sneaking around the lab. This game took that and flew away with it with awesome twists. 10/10 best game I've played

Got a friend, want to have fun working together and so some serious problem solving?  This game is for anyone who loves the escape the room experience, puzzles, and playing with a friend.  A must play.
Some of the best writing I´ve ever seen in a video game. I love everything about this game.

Если вы тот человек что только что вышел из пещеры и знать не знаете про Валв и серию Portal, то вы пришли по адресу. Что вообще портал из себя представляет? Представляет она из себя головоломку с порталами, турелями и Уитли. Да этот невероятно харизматичный робот будет почти всю игру с вами и будет выдавать смешные шутки, которые не запароли переводчики. Геймплей тут интересный, можно сказать 10/10, саундтрек не режет уши, а геймплей может заставит вас вернуться и пройти её 1-2 раза. Т.к. я ленивый ПNDOP то я возьму шкалу оценивая у Stopgame (не бейте позязя). И оценю на "Изумительно", граничащее с "Нашим выбором".
Я рекомендую портал 2 к ознокомлению сюжет затягивает а когда наскучит можно поиграть в кооп или карты от сообщества крч 100 уитли из 10
很好玩

The best puzzle game I've ever played. The level design is great, with many different types of mechanics that are used to complete them. And while you work on the levels you have hilarious dialogue to listen to from Wheatley and GLaDOS, pure comedy gold. 

There is also a pretty good story to go along with all these puzzles. 

And finally, the game supports Co-Op as well as custom maps!

One of the best games I've played in a long time. Addicting with a fascinating story. I could play this game for hours if the story line was longer. There are many great features to keep you coming back like community maps, or the ability to speed run single player to even co-op mode. Though I discovered this game many years after the initial release, I'm glad I did and had the opportunity to play such an incredible game.

Portal 2 is one of those games that's defined by Occam's Razor, where the more complex you try to make the solution, the harder it gets.

I will proudly say that there were times when playing the co-op with my friend, we were thoroughly stumped on at least three different puzzles because we tried to over complicate the solution. Keep it simple stupid. That being said, there are some puzzles that require a little bit more thinking then others because almost always there is at least two or three elements that you need to use to solve the puzzle.

The game is hilarious, witty, and can really twist your brain around. The puzzles themselves have a wide variety of difficulty. Sometimes the solution is very straightforward, but requires good timing, and coordination to solve it. Others give you fifteen different mechanics at once and tell you "Figure it out" where you will spend several minutes debating which solution is the correct solution. The game has a lot of replay value in it's coop, where you and a buddy have to solve puzzles together. Of course there are also community puzzles and such that you can do and create should you and your friend finish the portal 2 coop story.

Overall, this is a really good game that anyone should own.
Every person should play Portal series, highly recommended.
Порталь

Encore meilleur que le premier.  Mais, il as aussi ses défauts. Premièrement, certains passage sont tout simplement impossible  si on n'as pas le cerveau d'un première S. Ensuite, je trouve le jeu trop long. Après je ne sais combien d'heure a résoudre des puzzle (qui se ressemble tous), ça devient vraiment lassant. Heureusement que le jeu propose une bonne histoire, sinon on se lasserait vraiment très vite. Malgré tout ça, le jeu est quand même excellent et je le recommande a tout ceux qui on aimer le premier.

Zdecydowanie polecam. Dużo dużo rozkminiania jak działa każda plansza, potem kombinowanie jak dotrzeć do celu i oczywiście masa współpracy sprawia, że to jedna z moich ulubionych gier kooperacyjnych. Gigantyczna ilość plansz stworzonych przez graczy zapewni każdemu masę rozrywki. Nie raz z kumplem znajdywaliśmy plansze, które w naszym odczuci były nawet bardziej ciekawe niż oryginalne plansze twórców gry.

二代相比于一代有了很多进步！
1.关卡设计的更加巧妙，但不是很难。
2.关卡与剧情相结合，游戏体验足足的。
3.增加了双人和自制地图等强大功能！
4.背景音乐和画面很好。
好游戏！(最后炮台的bgm可能我很久了都忘不了了)
